name: Calci
description:
Calci is the hero we all need!

Fight ~baaad~ numbers that invaded your realm by using your powers of addition!

Add the numbers together to create an explosive number 10!

Keep an eye on your brain level in upper left corner! Math is not easy and it requires a lot of ~brain juice~ to calculate those numbers our of existence!!



Worry not, my friend! By using the power correctly you regain a bit each time you banish those pesty numbers from YOUR realm!

What you SHOULD worry about is the PURITY BAR in the right bottom corner!
Not only you regain brain juice with each number EXTERMINATED , you also increase purity of the numbers in YOUR realm!


A how to guide:
- WASD to move
- Mouse to aim
- LMB to grab
- RMB to throw
- Space to dash

Some advice! - Keep distance from the numbers, they ~bite~
